results.content: The course is good and detailed.  Easy to understand and follow and is a good example of building an ecommerce website using some intermediate techniques and integrating Stripe, orders and subscription and saving information in a Database.
results.content_html: The course is good and detailed. Easy to understand and follow and is a good example of building an ecommerce website using some intermediate techniques and integrating Stripe, orders and subscription and saving information in a Database.

results.content: Thanks to Trevor for putting up this course, I was able to refresh some concepts and learn much more about go and things that can be done with this language.

results.content: All Trevor's courses are a cut above the rest! He really enjoys teaching and this is very apparent. Well worth the investment folks!!
